elementlist.def: Yan, a vassal state of Zhou in modern Hebei and Liaoning, north Hebei, the four Yan kingdoms of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Yan %u524D%u71D5 (337-370), Later Yan %u5F8C%u71D5|%u540E%u71D5 (384-409), Southern Yan %u5357%u71D5 (398-410), Northern Yan %u5317%u71D5 (409-436), surname Yan :: swallow (a type of bird)
